item.name: Custom WxConnect - Merge JDS Identities and Add Aliases If Required
Create - journey-default-template2
Delete - journey-default-template2
Create email default events for journey-default-template
Create chat default events for journey-default-template
Create telephony default events for journey-default-template Copy
Create social default events for journey-default-template
Get Progressive Profile View - journey-default-template2
Get Progressive Template values against user
Get Progressive Template values against user using template-id instead - journey-default-template2
Get History Stream by Identity with filters
Get History Stream by Identity
Get History Stream
Simplified Post
Full Featured Custom Post w/ Comments needs to be edited

body.raw:
See https://github.com/CiscoDevNet/cjaas-widgets/blob/main/CustomerJourney/README_VERSION_10.0.0.md
{
  "id": "{{$guid}}",
  "specversion": "1.0",
  "type": "task:new",
  "source": "custom/{{$guid}}",
  "identity": "18505598991",
  "identitytype": "phone",
  "datacontenttype": "application/json",
  "data": {
    "Website visited": "[google](https://www.google.com)",
    "Visit Duration": "any fields you want goes in the data section",
    "transcript":"Text here will go into a modal window! You can fetch your transcript using the Captures API and post it in here! You may want to parse the script first",
    "uiData": {
      "division": "Department 1", <-- If you set the CAD Variable JDSDivision within flow control, the widget will only show events filtered by that value
      "hidden": "Test",   <--  This will hide your entry from the agent desktop, but will still store it in JDS
      "title": "My main title screen",
      "iconType": "Pick your custom ICON here!",
      "subTitle": "Smaller case subtitle! You can use Java escape codes in any text for emoji's \u2705",
      "filterTags": ["mortage"]  <-- If you set the CAD Variable JDSDefaultFilter within flow control, the widget will initially load with that particular filter set.
    }
  }
}

item.name: UC1 - Payment Past Due Notify 1

body.raw:
{  "id": "{{$guid}}",
  "specversion": "1.0",
  "type": "Payment",
  "source": "SMS%20Notifcation",
  "identity": "+12263762555",
  "identitytype": "phone",
  "datacontenttype": "application/json",
  "data": {
    "phone": "+12263762555",
    "Reason": "Late Payment Notification Sent – Notification",
    "MessageForUser" : "We have noticed your Waterbill payment is overdue. The payment of $544.73 was due Thursday, March 23rd.",
    "LinkSent": "[Payment URL](https://buy.stripe.com/test_4gw8AnfIUbLBcbC8wB)",    
    "Notification": "1",
    "Past Due Amount": "$544.73",
    "category": "Water",
    "status": "overdue",
    "channelBreakout": "sms",
    "uiData": {
        "title": "\u26A0\uFE0F Past Due - 1st Notification",
        "iconType": "Payment Notify",
        "subTitle": "Payment Due 30 days"
        }
}}

item.name: UC1 - Payment Made

body.raw:
{
    "id": "{{$guid}}",
    "specversion": "1.0",
    "type": "Payment",
    "source": "SMS%20Notifcation",
    "identity": "+12263762555",
    "identitytype": "phone",
    "datacontenttype": "application/json",
    "data": {
        "phone": "+12263762555",
        "Past Due Amount": "$544.73",
        "category": "Water",
        "status": "complete",
        "channelBreakout": "sms",
        "uiData": {
            "title": "\u2705 Payment Processed",
            "iconType": "Payment Complete",
            "subTitle": "Payment Complete"
        }
    }
}

{
    "id": "{{$guid}}",
    "specversion": "1.0",
    "type": "Payment Queue",
    "source": "Voice%20Contact",
    "identity": "+12263762555",
    "identitytype": "phone",
    "datacontenttype": "application/json",
    "data": {
        "phone": "+12263762555",
        "CallsQueuedNow": "Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
        "OldestCallTime": "Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
        "LoggedOnAgents": "Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
        "PIQ": "Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
        "EWT": "Use GetQueueInfoNode Values",
        "category": "Payment",
        "channelBreakout": "voice",
        "uiData": {
            "title": "Payment Queue",
            "iconType": "QueueCallNeutral",
            "subTitle": "EWT: Use GetQueueInfoNode Values PIQ:Use GetQueueInfoNode Values"
        }
    }
}
